plot: Anjala is a 2014 Tamil film directed by Thangam Saravanan. The film stars Vimal, Nandita, Pasupathy and Imman Annachi in lead roles.
title: Anjala
plot_es: Anjala is a 2014 Tamil film directed by Thangam Saravanan. The film stars Vimal, Nandita, Pasupathy and Imman Annachi in lead roles.
plot_en: Anjala is a 2014 Tamil film directed by Thangam Saravanan. The film stars Vimal, Nandita, Pasupathy and Imman Annachi in lead roles.
